import React from 'react' import './Body.css' import Header from './Header' import { useDataLayerValue } from './DataLayer'; import PlayCircleFilledOutlinedIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PlayCircleFilledOutlined'; function Body({spotify}) { const [{ discover_weekly }, dispatch] = useDataLayerValue(); return (
PLAYLIST

Discover Weekly

{discover_weekly?.description}

) } export default Body
